caption.p: QSI activity of crude C. grandiflora flower extract and CFEE identified by report plates. ( A) LB agar plate incubated by C. violaceum 026; ( B) LB agar plate supplemented by C 6-HSL and incubated by C. violaceum 026; “CK”, methanol as negative control; “0”, C 6-HSL; “1”, CFEE; “2”, 200 μg/mL succinic acid; “3”, 200 μg/mL malic acid.
